arm_group.description: Men older than 60 years old suffering from nocturia (one or more voidings overnight) without exclusion criteria
Women older than 60 years old suffering from nocturia (one or more voidings overnight) without exclusion criteria

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study is to validate the spanish (from Spain) version of the "Nocturia
      Quality of Life  Questionnaire and assess their psychometric properties, using the spanish
      translation provided by the copyright holder.

      Internal consistency (measured by Alpha cronbach coefficient), Reproductibility (measured by
      Intraclass Correlation Coefficient), Convergent Validity  (assessed using other already
      validate questionnaires such the International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS), King's Health
      and Pittsburgh Sleeps Quality Index questionnaires) and Discriminant Validity will be
      evaluated.

clinical_study.brief_title: Spanish (Spain) Validation of a Specific Symptomatic Questionnaire for Patients With Nocturia

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Men and women

          -  Older than 60 years old

          -  One or more voidings overnight

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Sleep disturbances

          -  Psychiatric diseases

          -  Surgical procedures during the time of study

          -  Introduction of new pharmacological treatments during the time of study

          -  Inability to complete the questionnaires

study_pop.textblock:
Men older than 60 years old suffering from nocturia (one or more voidings overnight)
        without exclusion criteria

clinical_study.official_title: Spanish (Spain) Validation of a Specific Symptomatic Questionnaire for Patients With Nocturia

oversight_info.authority: Spain: Comité Ético de Investigación Clínica

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: score in IPSS spanish validated questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: two determinations in ten days (only men)

secondary_outcome.measure: score in Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index spanish validated questionnaire
score in King's health spanish validated questionnaire

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
